sense.def: Alternative Names chuang du 瘡毒 , sores poison.

Pathological Condition Combined Designation of all types of severe, local and heavily suppurating chuang 瘡 , sores. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 63: 治一切癰疽、發背、腦癰諸毒瘡，及奶癰疼痛，並宜用雄黃膏 方 , “Employ the recipe for an ointment with xiong huang to cure all types of poison sores including all obstruction-illnesses and impediment - illnesses, effusion of the back, and obstruction-illnesses affecting the brain, as well as painful obstruction-illnesses affecting the breast”.
